meanings.definition: A written account or description of an event or experience.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading writeups about historical events.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked the students to write a writeup about their summer vacation.
meanings.sent3: The writeup of the school play made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her writeup of the concert was like a painting with words.
meanings.sent5: The writeup of the adventure was so detailed, it felt like I was there.

meanings.definition: The act of writing something, especially for publication.
meanings.sent1: His writeups for the newspaper are always informative.
meanings.sent2: She spends hours every day on her writeups for the magazine.
meanings.sent3: The writeup of the recipe made my mouth water.
meanings.sent4: The author's writeup of the novel was a masterpiece in itself.
meanings.sent5: The writeup of the breaking news was urgent and compelling.

meanings.definition: A collection of written reviews or critiques.
meanings.sent1: The website features writeups of the latest movies.
meanings.sent2: I always check the writeups before trying a new restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The writeup of the product was so glowing, I had to buy it.
meanings.sent4: Her writeup of the art exhibit was like a journey through colors.
meanings.sent5: The writeup of the book was so persuasive, I immediately ordered it.
